annotations.description: We saw a few chances and nice plays, but the overall impression of the game is uninspiring and not hugely entertaining. A very even game was seen on the pitch today. Both sides tried to combine well and to keep the ball at their feet.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: Nothing more will happen in this game as the referee blows for full time.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: This yellow card was deserved. The tackle by Ander Herrera (Manchester United) was quite harsh and Michael Dean didn't hesitate to show him a yellow card.
Antonio Valencia (Manchester United) dinks a cross into the box in an attempt to find one of his teammates, but the defence manages to clear.
Flag up against Mata (Manchester United). He had space to move into behind the defence, but he went too soon.
The resulting set piece, sent into the penalty area by Mesut Ozil (Arsenal), was easily dealt with by one of the defenders.

Antonio Valencia (Manchester United) makes a rough challenge and Michael Dean blows his whistle for a foul. It's a free kick to Arsenal, but they probably won't attempt a direct shot on goal from here.

annotations.label: time
annotations.description: 5 additional min. will be played.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Substitution. Alexis Sanchez leaves the pitch and is replaced by Mathieu Flamini (Arsenal).
Robin van Persie (Manchester United) is flagged for offside.

A neat pass is well received by Alexis Sanchez (Arsenal), who is lurking on the edge of the box and strikes the ball towards the middle of the target. The goalkeeper makes a decent save to block his shot.

David Ospina doesn't have to worry about this one. Marouane Fellaini plays a pass into the feet of Robin van Persie (Manchester United), who is unable to find the target as his effort from inside the box goes high over the bar.
Ander Herrera (Manchester United) makes a reckless foul in order to win the ball from his opponent. Michael Dean has a clear sight of it and blows his whistle.
Olivier Giroud (Arsenal) receives a brilliant pass and wastes a big opportunity as his shot from inside the penalty area flies narrowly wide of the left post.
David Ospina makes a superb save to deny a header which was nodded by Chris Smalling (Manchester United) after a cross from the side.

annotations.label: soccer-ball-own
annotations.description: What a bad luck! Tyler Blackett (Manchester United) got in the way of a pass and unintentionally sent the ball past his own goalkeeper. The score is 1:1.
Michael Dean blows his whistle after Mata (Manchester United) brings one of his opponents down with a strong tackle.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Ashley Young (Manchester United) decides to take a short corner instead of crossing into the box.
Antonio Valencia (Manchester United) fails to send a pass into the box as his effort is cut out. Manchester United have a corner.
It looks like Francis Coquelin (Arsenal) saw red with that tackle. Michael Dean won't tolerate such behaviour on the pitch and blows for a foul.
Chris Smalling (Manchester United) sends a long ball across the pitch, but it misses its target.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Mata (Manchester United) takes the corner but it's cleared.

Ashley Young (Manchester United) delivers a long ball, but it lacks enough power to reach his teammates and is intercepted by one of the defenders. Manchester United force a corner. Their opponents will face another attacking threat.
Theo Walcott (Arsenal) is adjudged offside.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Louis van Gaal is forced to make a change. David de Gea is unable to continue due to injury, Victor Valdes (Manchester United) comes on.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: The referee stops play so that a substitution can be made and Tyler Blackett (Manchester United) comes onto the pitch for Marcos Rojo.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Arsene Wenger has decided to make a change. Jack Wilshere (Arsenal) replaces Santi Cazorla.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Here comes a substitution. Theo Walcott (Arsenal) is brought on as a substitute for Hector Bellerin.

annotations.label: injury
annotations.description: David de Gea (Manchester United) is clearly asking for some medical attention with his painful gestures. The extent of his injury is yet to be discovered.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: The resulting corner, taken by Mesut Ozil (Arsenal), comes to nothing.
Aaron Ramsey (Arsenal) goes on a solo run, but he fails to create a chance as an opposition player blocks him. Arsenal force a corner. They send men into the box.
Mata (Manchester United) trips an opposition player and Michael Dean signals a foul.
The linesman raises his flag for offside before Ashley Young (Manchester United) heads on.
A poorly executed mid range free kick by Mesut Ozil (Arsenal) as he fails to deliver a decent cross.
Ander Herrera (Manchester United) makes a slide tackle, but referee Michael Dean blows for a foul. Free kick. Arsenal will probably just try to cross the ball in from here.
Robin van Persie (Manchester United) is adjudged to have been offside when making his run.
Alexis Sanchez (Arsenal) sends a quick through ball into space for his teammate who is lurking close to the offside line, but one of the defenders intercepts and clears the danger.

Santi Cazorla (Arsenal)'s poor effort is easily saved by David de Gea. He connects well with a cross, but mistimes it a little, and it heads towards the middle of the target and straight into the grateful hands of the goalkeeper.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Santi Cazorla (Arsenal) whips in the corner, but one of the defending players gets a head on it and intercepts.
Mesut Ozil (Arsenal) slides a pass forward, but one of the defenders cuts it out. Arsenal force their opponents to concede a corner.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: The corner from Mesut Ozil (Arsenal) is cleared away by the defence.

Olivier Giroud (Arsenal) darts into the penalty area to latch on to a pass, and he unleashes a low drive towards the middle of the net, but David de Gea is alert and denies him. Arsenal have been awarded a corner kick. The referee and one of his assistants both point at the corner flag.
Michael Dean blows his whistle for a foul after Ashley Young (Manchester United) hacks down one of his opponents.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: The referee allows time for a substitution. Falcao will be replaced by Robin van Persie (Manchester United).
Mesut Ozil (Arsenal) attempts to find some of his teammates with a dangerous pass from the edge of the box. The opponent's defence, however, intercepts the effort and clears the ball to safety.
Ashley Young (Manchester United) finds himself beyond the last defender, but the game is stopped by the referee after the linesman signals for offside.
Marouane Fellaini (Manchester United) is offside and the linesman raises his flag.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Mesut Ozil (Arsenal) swings in the corner, but it's comfortably cleared away.
Hector Bellerin (Arsenal) sends a pass into the box, but his attempt is thwarted and cleared. Now Arsenal have a corner.
David Ospina makes a save to deny the long range effort from Marcos Rojo (Manchester United) towards the middle of the goal.
Juan Manuel Mata (Manchester United) attempts to find his teammate with a pass from outside the box, but the opposition's defence is quick to react and thwarts the attack.
A crossfield pass from Aaron Ramsey (Arsenal) fails to find any of his teammates.
Alexis Sanchez (Arsenal) strikes the rebound, but it goes well over the bar.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Mesut Ozil (Arsenal) takes the corner but fails to find any of his teammates.
Nacho Monreal (Arsenal) flights in the cross, but the defender is alert and clears to safety. The linesman makes the right call and Arsenal will have a corner.
A pass from Ashley Young (Manchester United) is intercepted by David Ospina and the move breaks down.
Antonio Valencia (Manchester United) crosses into the box from near the side line, but he doesn't connect as he wanted and it's cleared by the well organized defence.
Falcao (Manchester United) takes a short free kick.
Per Mertesacker (Arsenal) commits a rough foul. Michael Dean stops the game and makes a call. That's a free kick to Manchester United.
Antonio Valencia (Manchester United) produces a quality cross into the box, but the opposition's defence intercepts the ball and spanks it away.
Francis Coquelin (Arsenal) deprives his opponent of the ball, but the referee blows his whistle for a foul. He's not happy with the decision!

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The second half has just started.

Today's clash hasn't been that attractive up to now, but it hasn't been a total borefest. There have been a few nice movements for both sides. Manchester United dominated the opening period and easily created the most chances. The home players have grown in confidence and started to string some passes together. The visiting side have relied on their defence and counter attacks.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The referee blows his whistle to end the first half and the players are now heading to their respective dressing rooms.
Juan Manuel Mata (Manchester United) attempts to find the head of one of his teammates with a promising cross into the box, but a defender outjumps the attackers and averts the threat.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Ashley Young (Manchester United) takes the corner with a short pass.

Daley Blind (Manchester United) sees his long range effort blocked. The referee and his assistant both point at the corner flag. Manchester United will have an opportunity to threaten the opposition's goal.
Daley Blind (Manchester United) gets in a good position to shoot just outside the box after a nice pass, but his effort is unintentionally blocked by one of his teammate.

annotations.label: time
annotations.description: Fourth official shows 1 min. of added time.
Francis Coquelin (Arsenal) gives away a foul for a clumsy challenge. Referee Michael Dean saw the whole situation. Manchester United are awarded a free kick. Let's see what they create from this.
Ander Herrera (Manchester United) is unable to feed a through ball into the path of his teammates.
Mesut Ozil (Arsenal) delivers a poor cross from a free kick as one of the defenders comfortably clears it away.

Phil Jones (Manchester United) commits a minor foul to interrupt the attacking move of his opponent and is warned by the referee that he will get a yellow card if he does it again. Arsenal earn a free kick.
Flag goes up against Hector Bellerin (Arsenal) and the referee blows his whistle for offside. The referee blows his whistle for offside.
Michael Dean blows his whistle and it's Falcao (Manchester United) who is penalised for an offensive foul. Good decision by the referee.
The linesman raises his flag. Falcao (Manchester United) is adjudged offside.
Antonio Valencia (Manchester United) sends a beautiful cross into the penalty area, but the opposition's defence manages to clear the ball to safety.
Per Mertesacker (Arsenal) gives away a foul for a fierce tackle on an opponent.
Alexis Sanchez (Arsenal) jumps into a tackle and Michael Dean blows his whistle for a foul.
Ander Herrera (Manchester United) receives a pass and unleashes a shot which goes well wide of the right post.
A crossfield pass from Francis Coquelin (Arsenal) fails to find any of his teammates.
Mesut Ozil (Arsenal) sends in a pass which fails to reach any of his teammates.
A pass by Ashley Young (Manchester United) ends up in no man's land, and the attacking effort comes to an end.
An attempted cross from Antonio Valencia (Manchester United) is cleared.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: It's a goal! Ander Herrera (Manchester United) scores with a brilliant shot into the bottom right corner after being released inside the box by a superb lofted pass from Ashley Young. The score is now 1:0.
Francis Coquelin (Arsenal) carelessly slides into the feet of his opponent and he'll be lucky to avoid punishment. Michael Dean blows for the foul but keeps his cards in his pocket on this occasion.
Laurent Koscielny (Arsenal) sends a pass into the box, but the opposition's defence is alert to the danger and makes a clearance.
Marouane Fellaini (Manchester United) should know this behaviour is beyond the rules. He was too careless with his challenge and left Michael Dean no option but to blow his whistle.
Falcao (Manchester United) fails to beat the offside trap and the linesman puts his flag up.
Ashley Young (Manchester United) fails to find a teammate across the pitch with a long ball.
Marouane Fellaini (Manchester United) sends a long ball across the pitch, but it misses its target.
One of the defenders reacts at the last minute to brilliantly block a pass from Aaron Ramsey (Arsenal).
The referee blows his whistle as Chris Smalling (Manchester United) was too aggressive in his challenge.
The Manchester United players are exchanging some short passes to try and open up the opposition’s defence and hit them swiftly on the break.

Juan Manuel Mata (Manchester United) attempts to beat the goalkeeper with an accurate shot from the free kick, which is placed dangerously close to the penalty area. However, David Ospina pulls off a great save to deny his drilled attempt towards the middle of the goal.

Hector Bellerin (Arsenal) was trying to get to the ball but clattered into the legs of the opponent as well. Michael Dean blows his whistle for an infringement. Manchester United win a free kick. It's a promising situation for a direct shot.
Ashley Young (Manchester United) sends a lofted cross into the penalty area. Unfortunately for him, the opponent's defence deals with his cross comfortably and intercepts it.
The game is interrupted, a clear handball by Marouane Fellaini (Manchester United).
Ashley Young (Manchester United) delivers a promising cross into the box, but it's cleared.

annotations.description: Mata (Manchester United) quickly takes the corner kick with a short pass.

Chris Smalling (Manchester United) is first to the rebound but his shot is blocked. Wow, what an escape there for the opposition. The referee blows his whistle, Manchester United are awarded a corner kick.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Nothing comes of the resulting corner from Ashley Young (Manchester United). The defence is alert and manages to cut it out.

Falcao (Manchester United) received a pass inside the box and sent a dangerous shot in on goal, but keep the champagne on ice as one of the defenders stepped in and blocked the effort. It's hard to say whether the keeper would have stopped it. The ball is out of play. A goal scoring opportunity from a corner for Manchester United.
A lofted cross from Ashley Young (Manchester United) is unsuccessful as the opponent's defence quickly clears the ball out of the penalty area.
Marcos Rojo (Manchester United) fails to pick a body out in the box with an over hit chip pass.
Neat passing move from Arsenal in order to create new attacking opportunities.
Ashley Young (Manchester United) creates a good chance for himself and goes for goal from mid range, but he misses the right post by a whisker.
Chris Smalling (Manchester United) sends a long crossfield pass searching out one of his teammates, but his effort comes to nothing and they lose possession.
Alexis Sanchez (Arsenal) races towards goal but the defender gets back well to make a challenge.
Mata (Manchester United) attempts to send a pass but the effort is blocked.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: Here we go, today's match is starting right now.

Michael Dean is the one to supervise the game today.

annotations.label: lineup1

Hello, welcome to our live play by play commentaries. You will be able to see a written form of all the interesting moments of the game, so you won't miss a thing. Sit back and have fun.

We saw a few chances and nice plays, but the overall impression of the game is uninspiring and not hugely entertaining. A very even game was seen on the pitch today. Both sides tried to combine well and to keep the ball at their feet.
